diff_act: 2.conduct necessary system checks to ensure all subsystems are in a ready state for operation
3.Ensure stability and integrity before transitioning to normal operations.

regen.absent_element: initialization of operational parameters and subsystem readiness check before executing startup mode
regen.new_specification: Prior to executing the startup mode, the TCS shall initialize key operational parameters and conduct checks to ensure all subsystems are in a ready state for operation.
The TCS shall initialize key operational parameters upon entering Startup State to ensure readiness for operation.

regen.absent_element: Actions to initialize key parameters and conduct checks before transitioning to normal operations
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall initialize key operational parameters and conduct necessary system checks to ensure all subsystems are ready and stable before transitioning to normal operations.

label: When the TCS Software is terminated normally the TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode of operation upon application of power.
absence: situation of the TCS Software is terminated normally
